activation.reactionTrigger: targeted by a hostile spell w/ a visible ray/projectile

system.description:
Requirement: Unused spell slot of 3rd level or higher or at least 5 unspent spell points, spell from the abjuration school available to cast.

You weave a quick warding symbol with your weapon, cutting hostile magic out of the air.

When you are targeted by a hostile spell with a visible ray or projectile (such as scorching ray, acid arrow, or magic missile) you may spend exertion equal to 1+ the spell’s level to counter it (spending 1 exertion to counter a cantrip). This maneuver has no effect on spells with an area of effect.
